line.originaltext: In a large bowl, combine the sugar, flour, baking powder, salt, dates and nuts.

line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5}, ing10, "things in bowl", "")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, combine the sugar, flour, baking powder, salt, dates and nuts.
Add the eggs, butter and vanilla; stir just until dry ingredients are moistened (batter will be very stiff).
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing6, ing7, ing8}, ing11, "things in bowl", "")

line.originaltext: Add the eggs, butter and vanilla; stir just until dry ingredients are moistened (batter will be very stiff).
line.annotation: mix(ing11, t0, ing12, "batter", "stir until dry ingredients are moistened")

line.originaltext: Add the eggs, butter and vanilla; stir just until dry ingredients are moistened (batter will be very stiff).
Bake at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown.
line.annotation: cook(ing12, t2, ing13, "baked bars", "bake for 20-25 minutes")

line.originaltext: Bake at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool bars on a wire rack.
Cool bars on a wire rack.
Cool bars on a wire rack.

line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing9}, ing14, "date nut bars", "dust bars with sugar")
